mapper.select: select t.positionname,t.maxnum,t.request,t.money,c.companyname,t.positionaddress from tbl_admin a,tbl_company c,(select * from tbl_position )t where a.cid=c.cid and t.aid=a.aid and t.positionstate='发布' order by t.positiontime desc limit 3
select c.*, t.Num from tbl_school as c left join (select sid,COUNT(*) AS Num from tbl_resume where reemploy='是' group by sid) as t on c.sid= t.sid limit 10
select p.proname,p.propic,p.prourl,p.procount,t.teachername from tbl_product p,tbl_teacher t where t.teacherid=p.teacherid LIMIT 8

select c.*, t1.Num from tbl_company as c left join(select t.*,a.cid from tbl_admin as a, (select aid,COUNT(maxnum) AS Num from tbl_position group by aid)as t where a.aid=t.aid)as t1 on c.cid= t1.cid limit 8

select t.job,t1.employ,t2.post,t3.talent,t4.company from (select count(*)as job from tbl_resume)t, (select count(*)as employ from tbl_resume where reemploy='是')t1, (select count(*)as post from tbl_position)t2 , (select count(*)as talent from tbl_user)t3, (select count(*)as company from tbl_company)t4
SELECT c.companyname from tbl_admin a,tbl_company c where a.cid=c.cid ORDER BY a.date desc limit 3

SELECT p.positionid,p.aid,p.positionname as sypositionname,p.positionaddress as sypositionaddress,p.maxnum,p.request, p.positioncontent,p.positionstate, p.professid, p.positionname,p.positionexper, p.money,p.positionaddress,p.industryid,p.degreeid,p.positiontime,c.companynum,c.companyname FROM tbl_position p,tbl_company c,tbl_admin a 1=1 and a.aid=p.aid and a.cid=c.cid
and p.positionaddress like '%${cond.sypositionaddress}%'
and CONCAT(p.positionname,c.companyname) like '%${cond.sypositionname}%'
and p.industryid = '${cond.industryid}'
and p.degreeid = '${cond.degreeid}'
and p.money between '${cond.moneybegin}' and '${cond.moneyend}'
and p.positionexper = '${cond.positionexper}'
and c.companynum between '${cond.beginNum}' and '${cond.endNum}'
order by p.positiontime desc limit #{cond.page},#{cond.limit};

SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_position p,tbl_company c,tbl_admin a 1=1 and a.aid=p.aid and a.cid=c.cid
and p.positionaddress like '%${cond.sypositionaddress}%'
and p.positionname like '%${cond.sypositionname}%'
and p.industryid = '${cond.industryid}'
and p.degreeid = '${cond.degreeid}'
and p.money between '${cond.moneybegin}' and '${cond.moneyend}'
and p.positionexper = '${cond.positionexper}'
and c.companynum between '${cond.beginNum}' and '${cond.endNum}'
select positionexper from tbl_position where positionexper!= '不限' GROUP BY positionexper

select t.* from (select c.*, t1.Num from tbl_company as c left join(select t.*,a.cid from tbl_admin as a, (select aid,COUNT(maxnum) AS Num from tbl_position group by aid)as t where a.aid=t.aid)as t1 on c.cid= t1.cid )t where t.cid=#{cid}
SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_position p,tbl_company c,tbl_admin a where a.aid=p.aid and a.cid=c.cid and c.cid=#{cid}
